aws_iam_group_policy.description: Provides an IAM policy attached to a group.

policy.description: The policy document. This is a JSON formatted string. For more information about building IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy)

name.description: The name of the policy. If omitted, Terraform will

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified

group.description: The IAM group to attach to the policy.
The group to which this policy applies.

policy.description: The policy document attached to the group.
